check_applets.description: Let regularly check if your applets are up to date
check_applets.tooltip: If applets updates do not concern you, uncheck this box.

update_applets.tooltip: Do you want to automatically update your applets set to TRUE above?

unprotected_applets.tooltip:
If you do not want an applet to be updated, set it to FALSE.
Useful for developers working on a new version of an applet.

btn_cs_applets.description: Open Cinnamon Settings to manage all the Applets

general_frequency.tooltip: Please note that the first check will take place 2 minutes after starting this applet.

general_warning.description: Notify me by changing the icon when Spices need an update
general_warning.tooltip: By checking this box, you allow this applet to modify its icon to warn you when at least one of the Spices requires an update.

general_notifications.description: Show notification messages about Spices updates
general_notifications.tooltip: By checking this box, you allow this applet to display messages about Spices updates in notifications viewer.

displayType.tooltip: This feature offers the Classic (default) display with icon and text, and compact display (Icon Only).
